headline: Discuss Introduces “Vibe Coding” and Hybrid AI + Human Market Insight Platform
summary: New release introduces vibe coding for market insights, enabling any team to combine AI-moderated research with the depth of human-led conversations.SEATTLE, WA, Aug. 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As AI-moderated interviews reshape qualitative research, many companies frame it as a choice between automation or human connection. Discuss, the only global market insights platform proven to deliver both, today announced new features that cement the hybrid model of AI-led and human-led research as the
